name: Short Film
description: A brief cinematic work, typically under 40 minutes. Perfect for focused storytelling, experimental concepts, and quick production cycles.

name: Feature Film
description: A full-length movie, typically 90-180 minutes. Allows for complex narratives, character development, and comprehensive storytelling.

name: Series
description: Episodic content designed to be part of a larger series. Each episode typically runs 20-60 minutes and contributes to an overarching narrative.

name: Documentary
description: Non-fiction content that explores real-world topics, events, or subjects. Can range from short-form to feature-length presentations.

name: Music Video
description: Visual accompaniment to musical tracks. Typically short-form content focused on artistic expression and rhythm synchronization.

name: Commercial
description: Promotional content designed for advertising purposes. Usually very short and focused on clear messaging and brand presentation.

name: Trailer
description: Preview content designed to promote longer-form media. Focuses on highlights and key moments to generate interest.
